column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=One time I drove over a piece of glass and it put a hole into my bicycle tire .
#text=I had to walk my bicycle all the way home , which was very unpleasant , and then I could not use my bike again until I had fixed it .
#text=So I looked up online how to fix a punctured tire , and went to the hardware store to pick up the necessary tools .
#text=After purchasing these tools I pumped some air into the tire to locate the hole and then I took the tire off of the wheel to repair it .
#text=I followed the directions on the repair kit which were actually very simple .

#text=After I had patched the hole , I waited for the adhesive material to dry and then I took the bike out for a short test run to make sure that if the tire failed again I would not be far from home .
